ChunkText: please read more about automatic visa revalidation, and see the list of eligible destinations please also note this rule is only for re-entry to the us, and does not play a role in allowing you to enter the country you plan to visit.
ContextBefore: please note this option is unfortunately not available for students from countries considered by the US government to be state sponsors of terrorism.
ContextAfter: you will need to make sure you understand and comply with the requirements for a person from your country to enter the country you plan to visit.
